<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="">[Findeladlara (The Guiding Hand)](/Deities.aspx?ID=109)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 73, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Findeladlara is the ancient elven goddess of art and architecture, who teaches the value of preservation, art, buildings and, most importantly, life. She assumed the twilight portfolio to guide her most fervent worshippers to safety in the wake of Earthfall, after they remained on Golarion to build shelters in her name for the survivors of the cataclysm.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Elven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=9)

**Edicts** Preserve art and architecture, bless and secure households, inspire and aid others with your works

**Anathema** Break laws of hospitality, knowingly allow a guest to bring harm to your family

**Area of Concern**
twilight and traditional art and architecture

**Follower Alignments**
NG, N, CG, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=3), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Star](/Domains.aspx?ID=52)
